name: Guarding Knowledge
text: Upon casting this spell, choose a specific variety of monster (red dragon rather than dragon) and one of its special attacks that you have successfully identified with a Knowledge check or otherwise researched, such as a cockatrice’s petrification ability or a spider swarm’s poison. You gain a +4 insight bonus on saving throws against the selected special attack. The bonus does not apply to saves against other monsters’ abilities of the same name, spell-like abilities, or special attacks derived from class levels or equipment. If you use a trophy from a monster of the exact same variety as an optional material component, the bonus increases to +6.
components_zh: 语言、姿势、材料/法器 (见下)
text_zh: 当你在施展此法术时，选择一个特定的怪物(像选择红龙，而不是龙)以及一个该怪物的特殊攻击，此特殊攻击是要你用知识检定，或其他方式成功辨识出来的，例如鸡蛇兽(cockatrice)的石化灵光(petrification)能力，或是蜘蛛集群(spider swarm)的毒素(poison)。你在由你所选择的特殊攻击，于豁免检定上获得+4洞察加值。此加值并不会在其他怪物的同名能力、类法术能力，来自职业等级或是装备所得到的特殊攻击上生效。如果你将一个从同种怪物身上获得的战利品做为可选材料成分，此加值增加至6。
